id: T1 Lime - Works would be to reduce the height by 3m from 18m to 15m and radially all round so no branch is shorter than 4m. This will compact the tree and remove the outer dead branches creating a crown lower with live growth. Works are on the grounds of safety and the trees long term life. Early signs of die back in the upper canopy which is common with this species.
addr: Woodlands Cottage Underwood Drive Rawdon Leeds LS19 6LA
